snippet.title: Ghostboy - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Would you return from death to help your loved ones through grief? Make fate turning decisions, micromanage the family’s relationships and defeat the negative thoughts on tower defense levels. Watch out, your job will be harder the more severe their mental disorder is. Recommended by psychologists.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2146560/Ghostboy/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ghostboythegame/
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@theghostboygame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gaming/Ghostboythegame
